name: Sokoban (mattizinho)
description:
A game in sokoban style and using Game Boy visual and perspective. You are a rat and need to take your cheese to the plates, so you can eat'em.

Instructions: Arrows to move the rat. GameBoy A button = Keyboard C. GameBoy B button = Keyboard R. GameBoy Start button = Keyboard Enter.

Watch out your steps on the top of the screen! Use then wisely!

Have fun!
